alert.note: Alert for South End of the Upper Sierra (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 1:19PM PST until December 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM MONDAY TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 2 feet above 5,000 feet and 3 to 4 feet in the highest elevations. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...South end of the upper Sierra Nevada, or areas south of Sequoia National Park. * WHEN...From 10 AM Monday to 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Also, monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: South End of the Upper Sierra
